pageContext.public_note: These spring break camps are 1 day classes. Students must sign up for each workshop individually. This Tuesday workshop is Animal Architects with LEGO workshop 2 and there will be different projects for each workshop.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Let your imagination run wild as we design and build leaping dolphins, buzzing beehives, and towering giraffes. Play, create, and learn in a world inspired by the animal kingdom. Design and build as never before and explore your craziest ideas.
pageContext.action_url_comment: These spring break camps are 1 day classes. Students must sign up for each workshop individually. This Tuesday workshop is Animal Architects with LEGO workshop
